commentList.content: Stayed here first time during my winter vacation. Very nice facility and very friendly and helpful staff. Location is super convenient, next to the Qianmen Road. Subway (line 7 and 8) is very close to the hotel. Many restaurants and shops are near by.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content:
It was in a great location! The room is a good size for 1-2 people.
I was here for one night and enjoyed my stayed. The staff was friendly and even translated things for me due to my poor chinese. 
I also had breakfast in the morning in the hotel, which was perfectly fine and normal! 
I’d recommend this place to someone and I would stay again.

Very good location (in a pedestrian street)
Close to the forbidden city
Hotel's staff is very kind and helpful. 
Breakfast Is OK, not exceptional.

commentList.content: The location of the hotel is in a very busy street. Great for walking around and lots of snacks. The hotel staff are very friendly and the breakfast was fantastic. Lots of options and fully stocked for the whole duration of breakfast. The room itself was good. Great bed and good amenities. Only downside of this hotel is, it’s noisy. We could hear our neighbours all the time.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Beijing Tiananmen Square and leave your stay experience here. Hotels are designed and serviced to keep our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content:
Very good location as walking distance to some great food places and other tourist sites.
Staff were super friendly as well, eventhough there was a language barrier

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！

commentList.content: The Superior Family Room isn't a place to while away the hours. It's functional and fairly basic (although the shower is fantastic) and its aim is to be a place to rest a weary head. Unfortunately, Beijing after the last scuffle with COVID doesn't have enough going on. Everything is hampered and frustrated by passport checks and QR scans. If I return to Beijing I would stay there again, but that is a long shot.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: The staff is great, they helped me with every single question I had, very nice and polite at all times. I'll definitely go back and recommend it to anyone who is planning to go to Beijing.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for your trust and love of CitiGO purchase. We are very happy to bring you a wonderful experience. Looking forward to your next stay.

commentList.content: This is a very good choice of hotel if you want to stay in the tiananmen area. It's right outside the metro station, and it looks modern and clean. Besides it's a very good value for money.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for choosing and staying at Beijing Tiananmen Square citigo Huange Hotel and leaving your feedback here. The design and service of the hotel are to keep our guests comfortable during the journey. Thank you for your sharing. We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest. We look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: Really enjoyed this hotel. Super cute room, very comfortable and spacious, and the TV was really nice. The staff was understanding and more than willing to communicate with us via translation app because of our lack of Chinese communication skills. The only drawback was the loud music that plays outside of the hotel from early morning until late night. Also, the air conditioning is turned off during the winter and it got a little hot, but they allowed us to move the air purifier to keep cool. The location was very cool, lots of fun things nearby. Would stay again.

feedbackList.content: Thank you for choosing and staying at Beijing Tiananmen Square citigo Huange Hotel and leaving your feedback here. The design and service of the hotel are to keep our guests comfortable during the journey. Thank you for your sharing. We will continue to work hard to provide more considerate services for each guest. We look forward to your check-in again!

commentList.content: Every thing was really good..Room was clean and specially staff was so kind and generous

commentList.content: 酒店很漂亮，大廳很寬敞，早餐很好，服務很熱情。房間很乾凈清爽舒適，設施很好。很愉快的一次住宿經歷！值得推薦
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is beautiful, the lobby is spacious, the breakfast is good, and the service is very friendly. The room is clean, fresh and comfortable, and the facilities are very good. A very pleasant stay experience! Recommended

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 非常滿意，比想象中還好，首先出行非常便捷，地鐵就在旁邊！房間雖小五臟俱全，智能化設施非常滿意！重點是這裏的服務太好了，每個人都笑臉相迎，讓人如沐春風，特別是小皓小帥哥，服務周到態度貼心❤！還有元宵節吃到了湯圓太開心了！細節滿分
commentList.translatedContent: Very satisfied, better than expected, first of all, travel is very convenient, the subway is right next to it! Although the room is small and well-equipped, the intelligent facilities are very satisfactory! The point is that the service here is great, everyone greets you with a smile, making you feel like a spring breeze, especially the handsome guy Xiaohao, who is thoughtful and caring❤! Also, I was so happy to eat glutinous rice balls during the Lantern Festival! Full marks for details

commentList.content: 酒店環境很好，酒店工作人員的態度也好好，非常滿意的一次住宿體驗，而且酒店位置離天安門廣場走路衹需要12分鐘左右，非常奈斯.
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel environment is very good, and the attitude of the hotel staff is also good. I am very satisfied with the accommodation experience, and the location of the hotel is only about 12 minutes' walk from Tiananmen Square, which is very nice.

commentList.content: 酒店離地鐵站很近，尤其是帶着老人和孩子出來玩，出行非常方便，地理位置絕佳，前台接待人員也很熱情，服務非常到位，環境整潔舒服，是個不錯的選擇
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is very close to the subway station, especially if you bring the elderly and children out to play, it is very convenient to travel, the location is excellent, the reception staff are also very friendly, the service is very good, the environment is clean and comfortable, it is a good choice

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Qianmen Beijing and leave your experience here. CitiGO is located at No. 112 Qianmen Street, surrounded by many snacks. CitiGO is a light luxury and social brand under Huazhu Hotel Group. We are committed to combining sleep and bathing To achieve the ultimate, use Hansgrohe and Duravit bathroom equipment in the guest rooms, powerful smart TV and other equipment to ensure your comfortable experience. From the bathing facilities to the mattresses are all internationally renowned brands, you can also feel the convenience and speed of the intelligent guest control system anytime and anywhere; we advocate that the room is only a place to rest, and the rest of the time is given to our public area, here , a strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join in the carnival. All the staff of the hotel are very much looking forward to meeting you again, let us leave the best memories in CitiGO together!

commentList.content:
酒店位置很好 早餐很好
設施：設施齊全，淋浴和馬桶都很舒服
衛生：很乾凈、房間有股清香
環境：環境很好
服務：很熱情
commentList.translatedContent:
The location of the hotel is very good. The breakfast is very good
Facilities: complete facilities, comfortable showers and toilets

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 第二次住這酒店了，上次是2021年11月，帶着爸媽逛北京，這次是2023年初的新春親子游！酒店乾淨、安靜、漂亮、服務人員熱情，而且地理位置相當好！出門就是前門大街，離珠市口地鐵站三分鐘路程，去哪都方便！出門左手邊十米內羅森，右手邊十米瑞幸，深得我心！哈哈哈！下次還來！！
commentList.translatedContent: This is the second time I have stayed in this hotel. The last time was in November 2021. I took my parents to visit Beijing. This time is a family trip in early 2023 for the Spring Festival! The hotel is clean, quiet, beautiful, the service staff is friendly, and the location is quite good! Going out is Qianmen Street, three minutes away from Zhushikou subway station, so it is convenient to go anywhere! Rosen is within ten meters on the left and Ruixing is ten meters on the right, which won my heart! Hahaha! Come again next time! !

feedbackList.content: 非常能感謝親能給予我們很高的評價，我們對您的熱情必定與日俱增，衹盼再次與您的遇見，因為這世間的遇見，沒有對錯，沒有早晚，珍惜，才是最美麗的語言。遇見，卻是在最美的年華！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you very much for giving us a high evaluation. Our enthusiasm for you must be increasing day by day. We only look forward to meeting you again, because there is no right or wrong, no sooner or later, cherishing is the most beautiful language for meeting in this world. Meet, but in the most beautiful years!

commentList.content: 服務周到熱情細緻，房間乾淨整潔無異味，早餐特別豐富，位置特別好，位於前門步行街，下次來還會入住
commentList.translatedContent: The service is thoughtful, warm and meticulous. The room is clean and tidy without any peculiar smell. The breakfast is very rich. The location is very good. It is located in Qianmen Pedestrian Street. I will stay here next time

commentList.content: 房間不大但是乾淨 免費的水跟飲料 窗戶打開就是前門大街 工作人員服務也挺好的 買了早餐 種類不多但是很好吃 好評
commentList.translatedContent: The room is small but clean. Free water and drinks. The window opens to Qianmen Street. The staff service is also very good. I bought breakfast. There are not many types but it is delicious. Praise

feedbackList.content: 能得到的客官的誇讚，我們都喜大普奔了。您的認可是對我們最大的認可，我們會帶着您的誇讚與大夥的期望繼續砥礪前行。
feedbackList.translatedContent: We are all overjoyed with the compliments from guest officials. Your recognition is our greatest recognition, and we will continue to forge ahead with your praise and everyone's expectations.

commentList.content: 酒店位置特別好，位於前門大街，走去珠市口地鐵站才兩分鐘，旁邊就是羅森。房間暖氣很足，也乾淨衛生，每天有供應免費的汽水。最後一天有寄存的行李落下了，拜託了前台幫忙寄快遞迴來，客服姐姐很熱心幫助！感謝！
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very good, it is located on Qianmen Street, only two minutes walk to Zhushikou subway station, next to Lawson. The room is well heated, clean and hygienic, and free soft drinks are provided every day. On the last day, the luggage left behind, I asked the front desk to send it back by courier, the customer service sister was very enthusiastic to help! grateful!

feedbackList.content: 距離拉開思念的帷幕才悄悄感悟，我們非常感謝您的體貼理解。你我約定一定常來哦
feedbackList.translatedContent: It is only after the curtain of longing is lifted that I realize it quietly. We are very grateful for your thoughtful understanding. You and I promise to come often

feedbackList.content: 點外賣還可以通過智能機器人送餐！很方便！
feedbackList.translatedContent: You can also order food delivery through intelligent robots! very convenient!

commentList.content:
酒店離天安門很近，位置就在前門大街上很漂亮。
設施：房間設施很全
衛生：衛生非常乾淨
環境：晚上很安靜 大堂的音樂很棒
服務：前台和客房的服務都很好，早餐也很棒。
commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel is very close to Tiananmen Square, and the location is very beautiful on Qianmen Street.
Facilities: The room facilities are very complete
Hygiene: Hygiene is very clean
Environment: very quiet at night, the music in the lobby is great
Service: The front desk and room service are very good, and the breakfast is also great.

feedbackList.content: 我們信奉客人為家人，提供無微不至的鄰裏服務，是一家有溫度的酒店，朋友們喜歡就多多推薦給親朋好友一起來小C家感受最貼心的服務吧~
feedbackList.translatedContent: We believe that guests are family members and provide meticulous neighborhood services. It is a warm hotel. If you like it, please recommend it to your relatives and friends. Let’s come to Little C’s to experience the most intimate service~

commentList.content:
最想說感謝的是前台小帥哥，訂房時電話溝通，幫我們協調到了孩子最想住的複式雙床房，並且想辦法幫我愛人升級到了華住會金卡會員，使我們在入住期間享受到了金卡會員的待遇，感謝🥹
再來說酒店的位置，就在前門大街上，離珠市口地鐵站步行3-5分鐘左右，交通便利；到天安門廣場、國博、看升旗，都是步行可達的距離。
衛生：酒店設施新、簡約大氣，衛生打掃乾淨、及時。
衛浴：酒店衛浴品牌為漢斯格雅，精緻高端，洗澡水充足

早餐：早餐竟然開到12點，太難得了，中西兼顧，👍
床品：床軟硬適中，非常舒服
總之，是到天安門、前門地區遊玩的最佳選擇。
commentList.translatedContent:
What I want to say the most is the handsome guy at the front desk. He helped us coordinate the duplex twin room that our children want to live in through phone conversation when booking a room. He also tried to help my wife upgrade to a gold card member of Huazhu Club, so that we can enjoy during our stay. I have received the treatment of gold card members, thank you 🥹
Let’s talk about the location of the hotel. It’s just on Qianmen Street, about 3-5 minutes’ walk from Zhushikou Subway Station. The transportation is convenient; Tian’anmen Square, the National Expo, and watching the flag raising are all within walking distance.
Hygiene: The hotel facilities are new, simple and elegant, and the sanitation is cleaned in a timely manner.
Bathroom: The hotel bathroom brand is Hansgrohe, exquisite and high-end, with plenty of bath water

Breakfast: The breakfast is open until 12 o'clock, which is too rare, with both Chinese and Western, 👍
Bedding: The bed is moderately soft and hard, very comfortable
In short, it is the best choice for visiting Tiananmen and Qianmen areas.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 酒店位置方便，離地鐵口近，環境好、乾淨衛生，孩子很喜歡loft，自己住在樓上1.2m的床，而且樓上樓下是雙洗漱間，分開睡能緩解一天的疲勞，酒店的熱水洗澡也很舒服，前台的小姐姐和小哥哥人都很熱情，走時還問要不要給帶些水在路上喝。下次還會再來住。
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is convenient, close to the subway entrance, the environment is good, clean and hygienic, the child likes the loft very much, he lives in a 1.2m bed upstairs, and there are double washrooms upstairs and downstairs, sleeping separately can relieve the fatigue of the day, the hotel's It is also very comfortable to take a bath in hot water. The young lady and the young brother at the front desk are very enthusiastic. When they left, they asked if they wanted to bring some water to drink on the way. Will come to live again next time.

feedbackList.content: 我們都是一羣愛“C”的同類人，您的滿意是我們永恆的追求。
feedbackList.translatedContent: We are all a group of similar people who love "C", your satisfaction is our eternal pursuit.

commentList.content:
酒店很方便
設施：設施很好
衛生：房間很乾凈
環境：在前門大街上 很靜謐
服務：服務很不錯
commentList.translatedContent:
Hotel is very convenient
Facilities: very good facilities
Hygiene: the room is very clean
Environment: very quiet on Qianmen Street
Service: the service is very good

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 服務態度非常熱情周到，早餐豐富美味。應有盡有，房間乾淨整潔衛生，床品特別舒服，點外賣機器人會給送，特別方便，入住體驗感一百分
commentList.translatedContent: The service attitude is very warm and thoughtful, and the breakfast is rich and delicious. Everything you need, the room is clean, tidy and hygienic, the bedding is very comfortable, the robot will deliver it when you order food, it is very convenient, the experience of staying is 100%

feedbackList.content: 小主的表揚，時隔多日終於被小C發現了呢~~對於小C來說，滿意衹是起點，驚喜與感動才是我們的目標。
feedbackList.translatedContent: After many days, little C finally found out about the little master's praise~~ For little C, satisfaction is only the starting point, and surprise and touch are our goals.

commentList.content:
設施：設施齊全
衛生：乾淨整潔

服務：服務熱情周到，距離地鐵站很近，出行特別方便，早餐豐富美味，入住體驗感特別好
commentList.translatedContent:
Facilities: fully equipped
Hygiene: clean and tidy

Service: The service is warm and thoughtful, it is very close to the subway station, it is very convenient to travel, the breakfast is rich and delicious, and the check-in experience is particularly good

feedbackList.content: 能得到的客官的誇讚，我們都喜大普奔了。您的認可是對我們最大的認可，我們會帶着您的誇讚與大夥的期望繼續砥礪前行。
feedbackList.translatedContent: We are all overjoyed with the compliments from guest officials. Your recognition is our greatest recognition, and we will continue to forge ahead with your praise and everyone's expectations.

commentList.content: CitiGo一直是不同城市的青年性價比之選，YQ原因朝陽區外賣難叫，搬來前門大街住幾天，一個人獃著工作。北京中心地標中軸線的前門大街南口進入沒幾步就是，酒店旁邊既有核酸點，又有為彈窗情況布設的核酸點，真心方便。這時期處處關門閉戶，這裏外賣速度也是真心快，白天沿着附近衚衕跑跑步，看看首都老城中心，也是散心的好地方。酒店前台服務盡心，外賣有小機器人送到房間門口，不需下樓取，也如所有Citigo一樣，一樓可以坐着工作，休息，洗衣服。不過這家衹有一個洗衣機和烘衣機，上午洗衣服比較不用排隊～
commentList.translatedContent: CitiGo has always been the cost-effective choice for young people in different cities. YQ moved to Qianmen Street for a few days because it was difficult to get takeout in Chaoyang District, and stayed alone to work. The south entrance of Qianmen Street, the landmark central axis of Beijing, is just a few steps away. There are nucleic acid points next to the hotel, and there are nucleic acid points for pop-up windows, which is really convenient. During this period, the doors are closed everywhere, and the takeaway speed here is also really fast. During the day, running along the nearby alleys and looking at the center of the old city of the capital is also a good place to relax. The front desk service of the hotel is dedicated, and the takeaway is delivered by a small robot to the door of the room, so you don't need to go downstairs to pick it up. Like all Citigos, you can sit and work, rest, and do laundry on the first floor. However, there is only one washing machine and dryer in this house, so you don’t have to queue up to do laundry in the morning~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leaving your experience here. The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 地理位置很好，距離地鐵站走路一分鐘，隔壁就是羅森便利店和瑞幸。環境方面，華住系的酒店衛生條件一如既往地好，房間麪積雖然不大但布局合理，裝修也很簡約大方。服務態度很好，送物上門速度快，剛放下電話沒兩分鐘送物機器人就來了。但有兩點不足，首先是入住房間靠近電梯口隔音不好，其次是房間wifi信號很差，衹能用流量上網。總的來說是一次不錯的入住體驗。
commentList.translatedContent: The location is very good, one minute walk from the subway station, next door to the Lawson convenience store and Ruixing. In terms of environment, the hygienic conditions of Huazhu hotels are as good as ever. Although the room size is not large, the layout is reasonable, and the decoration is also very simple and generous. The service attitude is very good, and the delivery speed is fast. The delivery robot came within two minutes of putting down the phone. But there are two shortcomings. First, the sound insulation of the room close to the elevator entrance is not good. Second, the WiFi signal in the room is very poor, and you can only use traffic to surf the Internet. Overall it was a good stay experience.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好！感謝您選擇天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在百忙之中分享了您的入住體驗，非常抱歉沒能給您提供一次完美的入住體驗，您反應的問題酒店非常重視，已通知相關部門進行排查處理，再次對您表示深深的歉意，我們真誠的邀請您再次體驗。您隨時可以聯繫前台，期待您的再次光臨！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Hello, dear guests! Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel in Tiananmen Square and sharing your check-in experience in spite of your busy schedule. I am very sorry that I failed to provide you with a perfect check-in experience. The hotel attaches great importance to your feedback and has notified the relevant departments to investigate and deal with it , I would like to express my deep apologies to you again, and we sincerely invite you to experience it again. You can contact the front desk at any time and look forward to your visit again!

feedbackList.content: 下次在附近玩還願意選擇。
feedbackList.translatedContent: Willing to choose next time I play nearby.

commentList.content: 地理位置很好 第一次住天安門大街附近 窗口的視野看夜景絕了 房間比我之前住的citigo大很多 也很安靜 就是桌子旁沒有插座辦公不太方便 早飯略簡單了 不過性價比很高 前台服務態度超棒
commentList.translatedContent: The location is very good. The view from the window near Tiananmen Street is the first time to see the night view. The room is much larger than the citigo I stayed in before, and it is very quiet. There is no socket next to the table. awesome

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Qianmen Qianmen and leave your stay experience here. CitiGO is located at No. 112 Qianmen Street, and there are many snacks around. CitiGO is a luxury and social brand under Huazhu Hotel Group. We are committed to combining sleep and bathing. To achieve the ultimate, in the guest room, the bathroom equipment from German Hansgrohe and Duravit, powerful smart TV and other equipment are used to ensure your comfortable experience. From bathing facilities to mattresses, they are all internationally renowned brands, and you can also feel the convenience and speed of the intelligent guest control system anytime, anywhere; we advocate that the room is only a place to rest, and the rest of the time is left to our public area, here , the strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join in the carnival. All the staff of the hotel are very much looking forward to meeting you again. Let's leave the best memories together in CitiGO!

commentList.content: 服務人員態度很好，清潔做的很到位
commentList.translatedContent: The attitude of the service staff is very good, and the cleaning is well done

commentList.content: 早餐十分豐富，位置也很棒，在前門大街南門處，出門就是地鐵7,8號線。這是兩條神奇的線路，貫穿京城東西南北，這幾天全靠它們出行了。

commentList.content: 房間環境好 服務態度很好
commentList.translatedContent: The room environment is good and the service attitude is very good

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京前門CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受，CitiGO位於前門大街112號，周邊小吃眾多，CitiGO是華住酒店集團旗下輕奢、社交品牌,我們致力於將睡眠和沐浴做到極致，在客房採用德國漢斯格雅、杜拉維特的衛浴設備，強大的智能電視等設備確保您的舒適體驗。從洗浴設施到床墊用的都是國際知名品牌，您還可以隨時隨地感受智能客控系統的方便與快捷；我們提倡房間衹是休息的地方，其餘的時間都交給我們的公共區域，在這裏，濃厚的社交氛圍會讓您找到更多興趣相投的朋友，融入狂歡。酒店全體員工非常期待與您的再次相遇，讓我們一起在CitiGO留下最美好的一段回憶！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Huange Hotel Qianmen Beijing and leave your experience here. CitiGO is located at No. 112 Qianmen Street, surrounded by many snacks. CitiGO is a light luxury and social brand under Huazhu Hotel Group. We are committed to combining sleep and bathing To achieve the ultimate, use Hansgrohe and Duravit bathroom equipment in the guest rooms, powerful smart TV and other equipment to ensure your comfortable experience. From the bathing facilities to the mattresses are all internationally renowned brands, and you can also experience the convenience and speed of the intelligent guest control system anytime and anywhere; Here, a strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join in the carnival. All the staff of the hotel are very much looking forward to meeting you again, let us leave the best memories in CitiGO together!

commentList.content:
酒店環境不錯，到店的第一天是vivi接待的我們。第一次帶孩子到北京，vivi很熱情詳細的介紹了北京的旅遊景點，並告訴我所有的景點都需要提前，讓我能如願的按行程進景區遊覽。
          這次唯一的小瑕疵是酒店的衛生問題讓我心裏不痛快，床單上有頭髮，在衛生間地麪也看見很多。不過好的是我自己帶着一次性床單被套，所以也沒有糾結這個問題。也因為剛到店的體驗很好，後面的不愉快基本就忽略了。
commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel environment is good, the first day we arrived at the store was received by vivi. It was the first time I brought my child to Beijing. Vivi gave a warm and detailed introduction to the tourist attractions in Beijing, and told me that all the attractions need to be in advance, so that I can visit the scenic spots according to the itinerary.
          The only small flaw this time is that the hotel's hygiene problems make me unhappy, there are hairs on the sheets, and I see a lot of hair on the bathroom floor. But the good thing is that I bring a disposable bed and quilt cover myself, so I don't have to worry about this problem. Also because the experience of just arriving at the store is very good, the unpleasantness in the back is basically ignored.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好！感謝您選擇天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在百忙之中分享了您的入住體驗，非常抱歉沒能給您提供一次完美的入住體驗，您反應的問題酒店非常重視，已通知相關部門進行排查處理，再次對您表示深深的歉意，我們真誠的邀請您再次體驗。您隨時可以聯繫前台，期待您的再次光臨！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Hello dear guests! Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Tiananmen Square and sharing your stay experience during your busy schedule. I am very sorry for not being able to provide you with a perfect stay experience. The hotel takes your feedback very seriously and has notified relevant departments for investigation and handling. , once again express our deep apologies to you, and we sincerely invite you to experience it again. You can always contact the front desk and look forward to seeing you again!

commentList.content: 蠻好的，衹是家庭房要走一段樓梯才能到，行李多的有點不方便，早飯很滿意做的很好吃，根本沒有機會出去吃小吃，家庭房總體不錯比較安靜，有露台比較通氣
commentList.translatedContent: It's good, but the family room has to go up a flight of stairs to get there. It's a bit inconvenient to have a lot of luggage. The breakfast is very satisfying and delicious. There is no chance to go out for snacks.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 很乾凈很舒適，服務很好，地理位置極佳，位於前門大街，離大柵欄北京坊很近，天安門也不遠，附近還有核酸點，而且非常安全，一百米以內有警察站崗
commentList.translatedContent: Very clean and comfortable, the service is very good, the location is excellent, it is located on Qianmen Street, very close to Dashilan Beijing Square, not far from Tiananmen Square, there are nucleic acid points nearby, and it is very safe, there are police stations within 100 meters

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 早餐非常好吃 服務非常好 環境還不錯 出行也方便 3個人住小loft 挺好的 下次還考慮
commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast is very delicious, the service is very good, the environment is not bad, and it is convenient to travel. 3 people live in a small loft, which is very good. I will consider it next time

feedbackList.content: 我們信奉客人為家人，提供無微不至的鄰裏服務，是一家有溫度的酒店，朋友們喜歡就多多推薦給親朋好友一起來CitiGO感受最貼心的服務吧~
feedbackList.translatedContent: We believe that guests are family members and provide meticulous neighborhood services. It is a warm hotel. If you like it, please recommend it to your relatives and friends. Let’s come to CitiGO to experience the most considerate service~

commentList.content: 出門就是前門步行街 步行五分鐘就能到大柵欄 鮮魚口 很方便。地鐵步行五分鐘燈市口 天安門廣場也不遠 。 服務很好 反應迅速。還有彩蛋 每晚十點有免費夜宵哦 雖然就是一碗餛飩 但是很暖心
commentList.translatedContent: Going out is Qianmen Pedestrian Street, and it takes five minutes to walk to Dashilan Xianyukou, which is very convenient. Dengshikou is a five-minute walk from the subway, and Tiananmen Square is not far away. Good service and quick response. There are also Easter eggs. There is a free supper every night at 10 o'clock. Although it is just a bowl of wontons, it is very heartwarming.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五，不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富而強大的共享客廳，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住!
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. A person's 9 to 5 is not as good as a group of people's happy place. I hope that the hotel's rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more wonderful experiences, and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content:
酒店很好 服務很棒
設施：全是品牌的 很舒適
環境：很好
commentList.translatedContent:
The hotel is very good and the service is great
Facilities: all branded and very comfortable
good environment

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leaving your experience here. The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 離珠市口地鐵站步行三五分鐘很方便，房間地暖很舒服，服務也很棒。
commentList.translatedContent: It is very convenient to walk three to five minutes from Zhushikou Subway Station. The floor heating in the room is very comfortable, and the service is also great.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Hotel Beijing Tiananmen Square and leaving your experience here. The hotel's design and services are all about keeping our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content:
交通：在地鐵站隔壁！走路2分鐘即可，十分方便！！
衛生：很乾凈，一塵不染，房間內也沒有異味

環境：很舒服，一進酒店大堂就很溫馨。
服務：服務態度超好！我們沒有帶水果刀，酒店前台幫忙削水果～很耐心解答我們的所有問題～
commentList.translatedContent:
Transportation: Next door to the subway station! 2 minutes walk, very convenient! !
Hygiene: very clean, spotless, no smell in the room

Environment: very comfortable, very warm as soon as you enter the hotel lobby.
Service: The service attitude is super good! We didn't bring a fruit knife. The front desk of the hotel helped to cut the fruit~ Very patiently answering all our questions~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 當初選這個酒店是因為離地鐵口和天安門廣場比較近，沒想到所在位置是旅遊步行街，吃飯逛街都不錯，核酸點也很方便。酒店完全是針對旅遊客人的，溫馨舒適，前台的楊小姐很周到，為我們推薦了早餐並介紹了酒店的特色。本想續住下去，無奈酒店預定已滿。早餐很合我們胃口，7-12點無限量供應，吧台消磨咖啡等飲品隨叫隨到，晚上免費宵夜混沌吃着很舒服。機器人送餐也很新穎！
commentList.translatedContent: I chose this hotel because it is relatively close to the subway entrance and Tiananmen Square. I didn't expect it to be located on a tourist pedestrian street. It is good for eating and shopping, and the nucleic acid point is also very convenient. The hotel is completely aimed at tourists. It is warm and comfortable. Miss Yang at the front desk is very thoughtful. She recommended breakfast for us and introduced the characteristics of the hotel. I wanted to stay longer, but unfortunately the hotel was fully booked. The breakfast is very suitable for our appetite. Unlimited supply from 7 to 12 o'clock. Drinks such as coffee at the bar are on call, and free supper at night is very comfortable to eat. Robot food delivery is also very novel!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您選擇北京天安門廣場CitiGO歡閣酒店並在此留下您的入住感受。酒店的設計和服務都是為了讓我們的客人在旅途中保持舒適的狀態。我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for choosing CitiGO Beijing Tiananmen Square and leave your stay experience here. Hotels are designed and serviced to keep our guests comfortable during their travels. We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
